wasIst.p2: It's the little things. Reviewing messages, searching for info, answering follow-ups, assigning documents. AI helps you organize information and make decisions faster.
wasIst.quote: AI is like a digital filter that only lets through what's important and pre-sorts the rest.

meta.title: Security ‚Äì AI with Control and Transparency | AKLOW
meta.description: If AI is to help in everyday life, it must be safe and controllable. Here we explain how security is practically thought of with us.

wissen_sicherheit.intro: If AI is to help in everyday life, it must be safe. We don't build a "black box", but a system with clear boundaries and full control.

features.title: Full Transparency
features.desc: You know exactly at all times what AI is doing, why it's making a suggestion and on what basis.

features.title: Approval Required
features.desc: Critical actions only happen when you confirm them. AI prepares, you decide.

features.title: Data Sovereignty
features.desc: Your data stays your data. We use encrypted channels and keep access minimal.

features.title: Audit Log
features.desc: Every action and every suggestion is logged. This keeps everything traceable and verifiable.

features.title: Smart Sandboxing
features.desc: AI actions run in protected areas. Manipulation from outside is proactively detected and blocked.

features.title: Access Control
features.desc: Precise roles and permissions ensure that everyone only sees what they really need.

items.label: Input Check
items.text: Every request is checked for risky patterns and manipulation attempts.

items.label: Context Isolation
items.text: Sensitive data is detected and only used where it really belongs.

items.label: Rule Validation
items.text: AI suggestions are checked against your fixed business rules.

items.label: Action Limitation
items.text: AI may only use predefined tools ‚Äì and only with your permission.

items.q: Can I define what happens automatically and what doesn't?
items.a: Yes. You can very precisely define what remains a suggestion, what needs approval and what must never run automatically.

items.q: Does AI have to send answers automatically?
items.a: No. You can start with drafts and only later automate individual, non-critical steps ‚Äì if you want.

items.q: What happens when AI is uncertain?
items.a: Then it shouldn't "confidently guess", but visibly mark, ask or hand over to you.

meta.title: FAQ ‚Äì We clarify that. | AKLOW
meta.description: Answers to frequently asked questions about AI modernization, applications, security and integration.

wissen_faq.intro: We know that AI raises many questions. Here you'll find the answers ‚Äì honest, direct and without marketing blabla.

items.q: What does "AI modernization" mean for you specifically?
items.a: AI modernization means: You don't get a new software world, but an intelligent layer that docks onto your real processes. It helps where time is lost today ‚Äì e.g. with requests, documents, follow-ups and recurring tasks. You start small, see benefits quickly and then build step by step.

items.q: Do I have to learn a new tool for this?
items.a: No. You continue to work in your existing channels (e.g. email, files, website requests). AI supports in the background and only gives you back what you really need: overview, priorities and suggestions.

items.q: Who is this suitable for ‚Äì also for small businesses?
items.a: Yes. Especially if you do a lot yourself, organization, prioritization and good preparation immediately bring calm. The decisive factor is not the size of your company, but whether requests, documents and processes regularly come together with you.
Absolutely. Data protection is not an extra, but a prerequisite. We clarify data flows, permissions and purpose. Our goal is pragmatic data protection that really works in everyday life.

items.q: How quickly do I notice an effect?
items.a: Often after just a few days. If we start with a clear time waster (e.g. organizing inbox), you immediately get time back. Our principle: first a small, measurable benefit ‚Äì then the next step.

items.q: Can AI respond in my personal tone?
items.a: Yes. You can specify tone and rules ‚Äì for example "short and clear", "friendly and relaxed" or "formal". So it stays your appearance, not a generic AI text.
